subject: EXIF headers cmdlinetool / was: Re: [Radiance-general] focal length
body:
btw1: for those who are inclined to use commandline tools, 'metacam'
writes EXIF headers to stdout
( see http://packages.debian.org/stable/graphics/metacam for details )
btw2: happy new year to all
-Peter
